original: 臨淮淮陰人，東吳將領，步協之子。與叔父步闡、兄長步璣常年鎮守西陵。因孫皓突然徵調步闡，步闡憂心被孫皓問罪，遂投靠西晉，更遣步璿入西晉為質。後孫皓派陸抗攻西陵，破城後，夷步氏全族。步璿因在洛陽為質，逃過一劫。
text: Linhuai Huaiyin, a general of Soochow, son of Buxie. Buchan with his uncle, and his brother Buji guarded Xiling all the year round. Because Sun Hao suddenly asked for stepping, Buchan was worried by Sun Hao, so he took refuge in the Western Jin Dynasty and sent Buying to the Western Jin Dynasty as the quality.
